sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO review_board ( unq, title, pass, name, content, rdate, udate, email, sns ) VALUES( review_board_seq.nextval, '$title$', '$pass$', '$name$', '$content$', sysdate, sysdate, '$email$', '$sns$' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT unq, title, name, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, to_char(udate,'yyyy/mm/dd') udate, email, sns, hits, ( select count(*) from review_comment where review_comment.p_unq = rv.unq ) commcnt FROM review_board rv ORDER BY unq DESC ) a ) b WHERE rn between #start_no# AND #end_no#
SELECT unq, title, name, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, to_char(udate,'yyyy/mm/dd') udate, email, sns, hits, content FROM review_board WHERE unq=#unq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO review_comment ( unq, p_unq, name, pass, mark, comment1, rdate ) VALUES ( review_comment_seq.nextval, #p_unq#, #name#, #pass#, #mark#, #comment1#, sysdate )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT unq, p_unq, name, decode(mark,'5','최고','4','좋음','3','보통','2','부족','1','나쁨' ) markmsg,
mark, comment1, to_char(rdate,'mm.dd') rdate FROM review_comment WHERE p_unq=#unq#
